title: Cleansing Crystal Lake
description: The serene Crystal Lake has been tainted by the presence of elusive Water Elementals. Kill water Elementals all over the Crystal Lake.

title: Clear Crystal Lake
description: Clear the area of Crystal lake.

title: Bandits and Miners
description: Hey there, could you lend me a hand? They've locked me up in this cell for no reason! I used to serve them, lead the miners, and now I'm stuck here... I want to revenge, can you help me?

title: Find the Lost Book
description: Your journey begins as you embark into the heart of Evergreen Forest. Your task is to find the Lost Book of Elders, hidden within the Tower of Damned. Be wary, for the forest is teeming with mystical creatures and hidden dangers.

title: Coursed Medallion
description: After reading Tattered Letter near a corpse, you discover a chilling message written upon it. The message speaks of a cursed medallion stolen from the altar within the Tower of the Damned. It warns of dire consequences should the medallion remain in the wrong hands.

title: The Night Watch
description:
As Commander of The Night Watch it is my sworn duty to protect the citizens of DuskWood. Mystic Hollow has retracted their commissioned guards from their posts here, leaving us to our own devices.

If you feel worthy of the task, we need your help! Assist The Night Watch by venturing forth into Tranquil Gardens, just south of DarkShire, and slaying 4 Skeletal Warriors and 2 Skeletal Mages. The undead threat must be thwarted!

title: The Night Watch
description: I'm getting reports of an undead infestation in the forest! If you're up to the job, journey to the Tranquil Gardens Cemetery and slay 3 of those vile Skeletal Fiends and 3 Skeletal Horrors. The undead must be driven from Duskwood!

title: Mor'Ladim
description:
From what my scouts tell me, Mor'Ladim wanders throughout Duskwood, following a strange and meandering path through the cemetery. We buried him out past the house on the hill, you know where that is?

There isn't anything I can do to help you, but I wish you good luck.
